trait.name: Special Equipment
text: Bosco wears a ring of animal influence.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: Bosco has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of Bosco's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Mace
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.
